t:
“Under the three laws as laid out by Isaac Asimov, we, the robots, thrive to keep the humans safe, healthy and happy.”


That same message ringed in my frail ears for the millionth time as my personal assistant revived me again and forced me to celebrate my 197th birthday.
c:
They've taken over, trying to follow the first law.



#robot #law #safe #revive #birthday #alive #force #isaacasimov
